name: Detective Tim(e)
description:
How to play: (Oculus Quest and Link)

1. Left Joystick to move (slide) around the scene. Right Joystick to turn your view left or right.

2. Click trigger on the left hand to switch between day and night.

3. Click trigger on the right hand to select objects that are different (spot the difference).

You are Detective Tim, a time-traveling agent that fixes the present timeline by looking at the past. You are assigned a burglary case at a house in town. It's your job to spot the 10 items that went missing the night before and teleport them into the present timeline.
